title: Himi 200
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Kuo toe nofo hifo
‘A hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū
Ki he nima to’omata’u,
‘O e ‘Otua totonu.
2.
Ke mou holi fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki he ‘Eiki anga’ofa,
‘O fetuiaki ma’u pē,
Ke ma’u homou ‘api tō.
3.
Ke mou fa’ifa’itaki
Ki he kakai ‘o e langi,
Ke mou mo’ui, ke ‘ofa,
Pea fa’a fakafeta’i.
4.
’Oku mou mo’ui mate,
Ki māmani mo e hia,
Mate mo ho’omou ‘ofa,
Ki he me’a ‘a māmani.
5.
Pea ko homou mo’ui,
Ko e mo’ui mo’oni,
Kuo fufū mo Kalaisi,
‘I he funga ‘o e Tamai.
6.
Pea te mou teunga’ia,
‘O hangē ko homou ‘Eiki,
Pea te mou hoko atu
Ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he langi. *
